original: Lindström, Sven Josef Gunnar, läroverksadjunkt, Borås, f. 29/4/95 i Lid-hult, Kronob. 1., av kommin. P. L. o. Anna Wickelgren. G. 30 m. Ruth Fagerström. Barn: Karin f. 31. — Stud:ex. i Halmstad 14, fil. mag. 19, pro vår i Gbg 25. E. o. lär. i Motala 19-20, Mora 20, Kristinehamn 21, Kristianstad 21-22, Ystad 22-23, Häl-singb. 24, Ystad 24, e. lär. i Hälsingb. 25-36, adj. i tyska, hist. o. geogr. v. Borås h. a. 1. sed. 36. Res. t. Tyskl. 20, 23 o. 29, Danm. 28 o. Norge 30.
translated: Lindström, Sven Josef Gunnar, high school teacher, Borås, b. 29/4/95 in Lidhult, Kronoberg county. 1st child of clergyman P. L. and Anna Wickelgren. Married to Ruth Fagerström in 1930. Children: Karin, b. 1931. Completed studies in Halmstad in 1914, graduated with a Bachelor's degree in 1919, completed teacher training in Gothenburg in 1925. Temporary teacher in Motala from 1919-1920, Mora in 1920, Kristinehamn in 1921, Kristianstad in 1921-1922, Ystad in 1922-1923, Hälsingborg in 1924, Ystad in 1924, permanent teacher in Hälsingborg from 1925-1936. Appointed as assistant teacher in German, history, and geography at Borås high school from 1936. Traveled to Germany in 1920, 1923, and 1929, Denmark in 1928, and Norway in 1930.
